subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Dre’ Bly said he had no plans to watch the N.F.L. draft this weekend, and Jerricho Cotchery said he planned to take in the entire 16 hours.
snippet: Dre’ Bly said he had no plans to watch the N.F.L. draft this weekend, and Jerricho Cotchery said he planned to take in the entire 16 hours.
